2077480.name: Vespa's Test - "Thank You" Pack
2077480.description:
"Vespa's Test" will always be a free game. However, if you'd like to support me, you may do so easily through purchasing this pack.

After doing so, you'll find a bonus "Extras" file in your install directory with a "behind-the-scenes" art page relating to "Vespa's Test", including older art assets, lore bits, commentary, and other visual goodies you may find interesting. It's nothing crazy or extensive, as the main purpose of buying this is to show support, but it's my way of saying "Thank-you" back to you!

All sales go directly towards future game development. This includes software licensing/publishing fees, hardware and tools for easier workflows, and books/resources focused on asset creation, so I can create better games faster.

Thank you!
